# ⚠️ LEGACY FOLDER - NOT USED

This folder contains **old versions** of JavaScript files that are **NO LONGER REFERENCED** by `index.html`.

`/assets/app.js`

**Do not edit files in this folder.** They are kept for historical reference only.
